description:
Simply type gallery-dl followed by the linkk into a termindal and you're done.
Only works on certain websites but for those sites it works like a charm.
summary: Simple to use, does the job

description:
Good to see gallery-dl available in snap form. It's compatibility with sites is unrivaled (pixiv, twitter,various booru-likes, dA). It's amazing how easy it is to keep a txt of artists names that gallery-dl can be scripted to regularly keep their galleries up to date. 
I'm not exaggeration when I say it changed my life! Forget everything you thought you knew about downloading, categorizing, and tagging hentai.... or....keeping up to date on.... fan scanlations.....
Oh god, I need a girlfriend....
summary: Changed My Life.... And It Can Change Your's Too!

description:
funktioniert leider nicht. Noch dazu voll umständlich.
Das hast schon mal besser und komfortabler gegeben.
Schnell wieder deinstalliert.

summary: Great application for downloading galleries in bulk!
